DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select§§n Convert(varchar, T.TransactionDateTime, 20) as TransactionDateTime,§§n S.SaleCode as PNR,§§n L.AccountCode as LocationCode,§§n L.DisplayName as LocationName,§§n OA.AccountCode as OpAreaCode,§§n OA.DisplayName as OpAreaName,§§n W.WorkstationCode,§§n W.WorkstationName,§§n Convert(varchar, T.TransactionFiscalDate, 103) as FiscalDate,§§n T.TransactionSerial as TransactionSerial,§§n P.ProductCode,§§n P.ProductName,§§n TI.QtyPaid as Quantity,§§n SI.UnitTax,§§n SI.StatAmount,§§n (SI.UnitTax * TI.QtyPaid) as TotalTax,§§n (SI.StatAmount * TI.QtyPaid) as TotalAmount §§nfrom§§n tbTransaction T inner join§§n tbTransactionItem TI on TI.TransactionId=T.TransactionId inner join§§n tbSaleItem SI on SI.SaleItemId=TI.SaleItemId inner join§§n tbProduct P on P.ProductId=SI.ProductId inner join §§n tbSale S on S.SaleId=T.SaleId inner join§§n tbWorkstation W on W.WorkstationId=T.WorkstationId inner join§§n tbAccount OA on OA.AccountId=T.OpAreaId inner join§§n tbAccount L on L.AccountId=OA.ParentAccountId §§nwhere§§n P.ProductType = 1 and§§n T.TransactionFiscalDate>=:@DateFrom and§§n T.TransactionFiscalDate<=:@DateTo and§§n (:@OpAreaId is null or OA.AccountId=:@OpAreaId) and§§n (:@LocationId is null or L.AccountId=:@LocationId)§§norder by§§n T.TransactionDateTime
